caption: The video tells the story of the eve when Earth will be drawn and torn apart by Jupiter due to the planet's gravitational pull. All humans and rescue teams on Earth receive the AI broadcast and are told to give up hope that the end will come. A brother and sister are part of a rescue team that says disaster can be prevented by igniting flammable gases in the middle of Jupiter's Earth. After the members of the team verify that success is feasible, the brother and sister's team heads in the opposite direction and decides to save the world. In the main character team on the way to save the world heavy burden, the rescue team feel disheartened, and have chosen to give up. Brother and sister came to a ignition device, but found that the ignition device is unusually large.
